name.zh_CN: Lark AnyCross - 单点登录助手

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lark AnyCross SSO Assistant is a secure, convenient way for organizations on Lark to manage user authentication and access control…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lark AnyCross SSO Assistant is a secure, convenient way for organizations on Lark to manage user authentication and access control across apps in the browser. Your organization administrator can assign accounts to members on AnyCross; and then, with this plugin installed, members can access multiple apps once they are logged in to Lark, eliminating the need for separate usernames and passwords.
